channel.title: Need Help with a few things
channel.description:
I want to know how I add Music to my client.. I've looked evrywhere. [hr] I also want to know how to make the client connect to my ip only. Like we say that i have "0.0.0.0", How do i make the client connect to that ip and I can't change the ip later..
[IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/ofos42.jpg[/img]
(How do I take that out)

item.title: Need Help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Client.java. Search for “Username:” and/or “Password:” And remove the ones below them that show the IP and port.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help with a few things

item.title: Need Help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

For the Ip, Go to Client.Java

Read full topic
